priority_actions.action: Apply copper-based fungicide to affected tea bushes
priority_actions.reason: Treat blister blight before high humidity worsens spread

priority_actions.action: Prune affected branches to improve air circulation
priority_actions.reason: Reduce moisture retention that encourages fungal growth

priority_actions.action: Inspect neighboring bushes for early signs of infection
priority_actions.reason: Early detection prevents widespread outbreak

weather_considerations: High humidity (85%) increases fungal disease risk
Apply fungicide before expected rain for better absorption
Avoid harvesting wet leaves to prevent disease spread
action_plan.expected_outcomes: With treatment, expect recovery in 2-3 weeks and reduced spread to neighboring plants

summary.sms_message: John, hatua ya wiki: 🌿 Nyunyiza dawa ya fungicide kwa majani yenye ugonjwa kabla ya mvua. Piga *384# kwa maelezo zaidi.
summary.voice_script: Habari John. Hii ni mpango wako wa wiki. Kwanza, nyunyiza dawa ya fungicide kwa majani yenye ugonjwa ndani ya masaa 48 kabla ya mvua. Pili, kata matawi yaliyoathirika baada ya kunyunyiza dawa ili kuongeza mzunguko wa hewa. Tatu, kagua mimea jirani kwa ishara za mapema za maambukizi. Mvua inatarajiwa, kwa hivyo fanya haraka. Asante.

metadata.description: Standard weekly plan - moderate diagnosis, rainy weather

priority_actions.action: Apply acaricide spray (dicofol or abamectin) immediately
priority_actions.timing: Today, early morning or late evening
priority_actions.reason: Critical spider mite infestation requires immediate action before population explodes

priority_actions.action: Set up emergency irrigation with 25mm water every 2 days
priority_actions.timing: Start immediately, continue through heat wave
priority_actions.reason: Drought stress and heat wave will kill plants without water

priority_actions.action: Apply mulch layer (5-10cm) around all bushes
priority_actions.reason: Retain soil moisture during extreme heat

priority_actions.action: Remove heavily infested leaves and burn them
priority_actions.reason: Reduce mite population and prevent re-infestation

weather_considerations: ALERT: Heat wave expected - plan work for early morning
Very low humidity (40%) favors pest reproduction
No rain expected - irrigation is essential
Work during coolest parts of day to protect yourself
action_plan.expected_outcomes: Immediate action critical - expect 2-3 week recovery if all steps followed. Delayed action risks total crop loss.

summary.sms_message: Peter HARAKA! 🚨 Nyunyiza dawa ya mite LEO + mwagilia maji. Joto kali wiki hii! Piga *384# sasa.
summary.voice_script: Habari Peter. Kuna hali ya dharura kwenye shamba lako. Kuna wadudu wengi na joto kali linakuja. Kwanza, nyunyiza dawa ya mite leo asubuhi au jioni. Ni muhimu sana. Pili, anza kumwagilia maji mara moja kwa sababu mvua haitakuja wiki hii. Tatu, weka matandazo kuzunguka mimea yako. Fanya hizi leo. Subiri na itakuwa mbaya zaidi. Asante.

metadata.description: Critical situation - pest outbreak + drought + heat wave

priority_actions.action: Clear all drainage channels around tea fields
priority_actions.reason: Prevent waterlogging and root rot during heavy rains

priority_actions.action: Apply preventive fungicide spray to healthy plants
priority_actions.reason: High humidity will create ideal conditions for fungal diseases

priority_actions.action: Reinforce mulch on slopes to prevent soil erosion
priority_actions.reason: Protect topsoil and plant roots from erosion

priority_actions.action: Postpone any planned harvesting until weather improves
priority_actions.reason: Wet tea leaves have lower quality and can spread diseases

weather_considerations: ALERT: Heavy rain warning for the week
Flooding risk in low-lying areas
Very high humidity (92%) increases fungal disease risk
Plan indoor activities for heavy rain days
action_plan.expected_outcomes: Proper preparation will protect crops from rain damage and fungal infection. Resume normal operations when weather clears.

summary.sms_message: Grace, mvua kubwa inakuja! 🌧️ Safisha mifereji yako leo. Nyunyiza dawa ya fungus kabla ya mvua. Piga *384# kwa maelezo.
summary.voice_script: Habari Grace. Wiki hii mvua kubwa inatarajiwa. Kwanza, safisha mifereji yote leo kabla ya mvua kuanza. Pili, nyunyiza dawa ya kuzuia ugonjwa wa fungus wakati bado kavu. Tatu, imarisha matandazo ili kuzuia mmomonyoko wa udongo. Nne, usivune chai wiki hii kwa sababu majani yenye unyevu yana ubora mdogo. Jiandae sasa. Asante.

metadata.description: Weather-focused - heavy rain and flooding preparation

priority_actions.action: Continue regular harvesting schedule (every 7-10 days)
priority_actions.reason: Maintain high quality with timely plucking

priority_actions.action: Apply balanced NPK fertilizer to support continued growth
priority_actions.reason: Sustain excellent performance and healthy plant nutrition

priority_actions.action: Document current farming practices for knowledge sharing
priority_actions.reason: Your success can help other farmers in the region

weather_considerations: Good weather conditions expected
Moderate humidity (70%) is optimal for tea growth
Light rain mid-week is ideal for fertilizer application
action_plan.expected_outcomes: Maintain excellent quality scores with consistent care. Consider expanding best practices to improve yields further.

summary.sms_message: Mary, chai yako nzuri sana! ⭐ Endelea kama kawaida. Weka mbolea wiki hii. Hongera! Piga *384# kwa maelezo.
summary.voice_script: Habari Mary. Chai yako iko vizuri sana, hongera! Kwa wiki hii, kwanza, endelea na ratiba yako ya kawaida ya kuvuna. Pili, weka mbolea katikati ya wiki kabla ya mvua kidogo. Endelea kazi nzuri. Wewe ni mfano mzuri kwa wakulima wengine. Asante.

priority_actions.action: Apply nitrogen-rich fertilizer (urea) at 50g per bush
priority_actions.reason: Address severe nitrogen deficiency causing yellow leaves and poor growth

priority_actions.action: Apply systemic fungicide (carbendazim) to treat grey blight
priority_actions.reason: Stop fungal spread before humidity increases it

priority_actions.action: Do NOT prune any more - allow natural recovery
priority_actions.reason: Plants are stressed from over-pruning and need time to recover

priority_actions.action: Schedule consultation with local extension officer
priority_actions.reason: Get expert guidance on recovery plan for multiple issues

weather_considerations: Mixed weather (50% rain) - good for fertilizer absorption
Moderate humidity - watch for fungal spread
Apply treatments during dry windows
action_plan.expected_outcomes: Recovery will take 6-8 weeks due to multiple issues. Focus on one treatment at a time. Expect gradual improvement starting week 3-4.

summary.sms_message: James, mimea yako inahitaji msaada! 🌱 Weka mbolea ya urea SASA. Usikate tena. Piga *384# sasa kwa hatua muhimu.
summary.voice_script: Habari James. Mimea yako ina matatizo kadhaa, lakini tunaweza kusaidia. Kwanza, weka mbolea ya urea gramu hamsini kwa kila mmea ndani ya masaa 48. Pili, nyunyiza dawa ya fungus baada ya siku tatu au nne. Tatu, usikata mimea tena kwa wiki sita. Mimea yanahitaji kupumzika. Nne, piga simu ofisi ya kilimo wiki hii kwa ushauri zaidi. Fanya polepole, hatua moja kwa wakati. Asante.

metadata.description: Struggling farmer - multiple issues, prioritized recovery

priority_actions.action: Conduct thorough inspection of all tea bushes for pest or disease signs
priority_actions.reason: Proactive monitoring catches problems early when easier to treat

priority_actions.action: Apply preventive copper fungicide spray
priority_actions.reason: Seasonal prevention is cheaper than treating outbreaks

priority_actions.action: Review and adjust fertilizer schedule based on plant growth
priority_actions.reason: Optimize nutrition for best yield and quality

weather_considerations: Normal weather expected - good for routine maintenance
Moderate humidity - low disease risk
Plan outdoor work for dry days
action_plan.expected_outcomes: Maintain current stable performance with proactive care. Early detection of any issues will prevent major problems.

summary.sms_message: Sarah, chai yako iko sawa! 👀 Kagua mimea yako wiki hii. Nyunyiza dawa ya kuzuia ugonjwa. Piga *384# kwa maelezo.
summary.voice_script: Habari Sarah. Chai yako iko vizuri. Kwa wiki hii, kwanza, kagua mimea yako yote kwa makini kutafuta ishara za wadudu au magonjwa. Pili, nyunyiza dawa kidogo ya kuzuia fungus. Ni bora kuzuia kuliko kutibu. Endelea kazi nzuri. Asante.

metadata.description: No active diagnoses - proactive best practices

priority_actions.action: Apply copper fungicide to affected bushes
priority_actions.reason: Treat blister blight before rain increases spread

priority_actions.action: Prune diseased branches
priority_actions.reason: Improve air circulation

weather_considerations: Rain expected - apply before wet conditions

summary.sms_message: David, hatua ya wiki: 🌿 Nyunyiza dawa ya fungicide kabla ya mvua. Kata matawi yenye ugonjwa. Piga *384# kwa maelezo zaidi.
summary.voice_script: Habari David. Nyunyiza dawa ya fungicide ndani ya masaa 48. Kata matawi yaliyoathirika. Mvua inakuja, fanya haraka. Asante.

metadata.description: SMS format request - short summary validation

priority_actions.action: Apply potassium-rich fertilizer (muriate of potash)
priority_actions.reason: Address potassium deficiency affecting leaf quality

priority_actions.action: Improve irrigation during dry period
priority_actions.reason: Help nutrient uptake during low rainfall

weather_considerations: Light rain expected - good for fertilizer absorption
Supplement with irrigation between rains
action_plan.expected_outcomes: Expect improvement in 4-5 weeks with proper fertilization

summary.sms_message: Elizabeth, chai inahitaji mbolea! 🌱 Weka mbolea ya potash wiki hii. Mwagilia kila siku 3. Piga *384#.
summary.voice_script: Habari Elizabeth. Mimea yako inahitaji mbolea ya potash kwa sababu majani yanaonyesha upungufu wa virutubisho. Kwanza, weka mbolea ya potash karibu na kila mmea wiki hii. Gramu hamsini kwa kila mmea. Pili, mwagilia maji kila siku tatu kwa sababu mvua itakuwa kidogo. Hii itasaidia mimea kupata virutubisho vizuri. Kwa wiki nne au tano, unapaswa kuona maboresho. Asante sana.

priority_actions.action: Assess actual field conditions - check soil moisture in different areas
priority_actions.reason: Conflicting diagnoses suggest different areas have different problems

priority_actions.action: For dry areas: Apply irrigation and mulch
priority_actions.reason: Address drought stress in affected zones

priority_actions.action: For wet areas: Clear drainage and avoid watering
priority_actions.reason: Address waterlogging in low-lying zones

priority_actions.action: Consider field re-mapping for zone-specific management
priority_actions.reason: Different areas need different treatment approaches

weather_considerations: Mixed weather ahead - plan treatments for appropriate conditions
Monitor both dry and wet zones separately
Irrigation schedule should vary by zone
action_plan.expected_outcomes: Zone-specific treatment approach should show improvement in 3-4 weeks. Proper drainage and irrigation management is key.

summary.sms_message: Joseph, kagua shamba! 📍 Sehemu tofauti zina matatizo tofauti. Angalia unyevu wa udongo kwanza. Piga *384# kwa mpango.
summary.voice_script: Habari Joseph. Shamba lako lina matatizo mawili tofauti. Sehemu zingine zina ukame, sehemu zingine zina maji mengi. Kwanza, kagua udongo katika sehemu tofauti za shamba. Pili, kwa sehemu kavu, mwagilia na weka matandazo. Tatu, kwa sehemu yenye maji mengi, safisha mifereji na usimwagilie. Shamba lako linahitaji mpango tofauti kwa kila sehemu. Asante.

metadata.description: Edge case - conflicting diagnoses (drought AND waterlogging)

priority_actions.action: Set up frost protection overnight (shade cloth or plastic covers)
priority_actions.reason: More frost expected - protect remaining healthy plants

priority_actions.action: Apply heavy mulch (10-15cm) around all bushes
priority_actions.reason: Insulate roots from freezing temperatures

priority_actions.action: Do NOT harvest or prune frost-damaged leaves yet
priority_actions.reason: Damaged leaves protect inner growth during continued cold

priority_actions.action: Consider smoke pots or small fires near plants if frost severe
priority_actions.reason: Traditional method to raise overnight temperatures slightly

weather_considerations: ALERT: Frost warning and cold snap expected
Temperatures near 5C - dangerous for tea plants
Very low humidity (35%) increases frost damage risk
No rain - dry conditions worsen cold damage
action_plan.expected_outcomes: Focus on survival this week. Recovery assessment possible after temperatures rise. Some plants may not survive - prepare for replanting.

summary.sms_message: Agnes HATARI! ❄️ Frost inakuja usiku! Funika mimea LEO kabla ya jua kutua. Weka matandazo mengi. Piga *384# sasa!
summary.voice_script: Habari Agnes. Kuna hatari kubwa ya frost usiku huu na wiki hii. Kwanza, funika mimea yako leo kabla ya jua kutua na vitambaa au plastiki. Pili, weka matandazo mengi karibu na mimea, sentimita kumi hadi kumi na tano. Tatu, usivune au kukate majani yaliyoharibika bado. Yanasaidia kulinda mimea. Nne, ukiweza, weka moto mdogo karibu na mimea usiku wa baridi sana. Hii ni dharura. Fanya sasa. Asante.

priority_actions.action: Remove and destroy all branches showing bacterial canker symptoms
priority_actions.reason: Bacterial canker spreads quickly - remove infected material first

priority_actions.action: Apply copper bactericide to cut surfaces and surrounding healthy plants
priority_actions.reason: Prevent bacterial infection of remaining healthy tissue

priority_actions.action: Apply insecticide (thiamethoxam or imidacloprid) for tea mosquito bug
priority_actions.timing: 2-3 days after bactericide, during dry window
priority_actions.reason: Control pest population before rain increases humidity

priority_actions.action: Postpone nitrogen fertilizer application for 2 weeks
priority_actions.reason: Stressed plants cannot absorb nutrients well - treat infections first

weather_considerations: Moderate rain expected - apply treatments during dry windows
High humidity favors bacterial spread - act quickly
Space treatments apart - don't overload stressed plants
action_plan.expected_outcomes: Prioritize bacterial canker control first, then pest management. Nutrient deficiency will improve once plant health stabilizes. Full recovery in 6-8 weeks.

summary.sms_message: Michael, hatua 3 kwa mpangilio! 🚨 1)Ondoa matawi yenye ugonjwa LEO 2)Nyunyiza dawa ya bacteria 3)Dawa ya wadudu baadaye. *384#
summary.voice_script: Habari Michael. Shamba lako lina matatizo matatu, lakini tutashughulikia kwa mpangilio. Kwanza, ondoa na uchome matawi yote yenye ishara za ugonjwa wa bacteria LEO. Hii ni muhimu sana. Pili, nyunyiza dawa ya copper kwenye sehemu zilizokatwa na mimea jirani. Tatu, baada ya siku mbili au tatu, nyunyiza dawa ya wadudu kwa mbu wa chai. Nne, USIWEKE mbolea bado. Mimea inahitaji kupona kwanza. Fanya hatua moja kwa wakati. Asante.

metadata.description: Complex case - prioritized treatment sequence for multiple issues

priority_actions.action: Set up irrigation schedule: 30mm water every 3 days
priority_actions.reason: Drought warning - proactive water management essential

priority_actions.action: Apply mulch layer (8-10cm) to retain soil moisture
priority_actions.reason: Reduce water evaporation during hot dry period

priority_actions.action: Harvest tea leaves promptly to reduce plant water needs
priority_actions.reason: Fewer leaves means less water stress during drought

weather_considerations: ALERT: Drought warning for the region
Low rainfall expected (20%) - irrigation critical
Higher temperatures (28C) increase water needs
Low humidity (55%) - evaporation losses higher
action_plan.expected_outcomes: With proactive water management, maintain plant health through drought. Plants are healthy now - goal is prevention, not treatment.

summary.sms_message: Ruth, chai yako ni sawa, lakini ukame unakuja! 💧 Anza kumwagilia sasa. Weka matandazo. Piga *384# kwa maelezo.
summary.voice_script: Habari Ruth. Chai yako iko vizuri sana, hongera! Lakini ukame unakuja wiki hii, kwa hivyo tunahitaji kujiandaa. Kwanza, anza kumwagilia maji kila siku tatu, milimita thelathini. Pili, weka matandazo mengi karibu na mimea kuhifadhi unyevu. Tatu, vuna chai haraka haraka wiki hii ili kupunguza maji yanayohitajika na mimea. Kuwa tayari na utahifadhi ubora wako mzuri. Asante.

metadata.description: Healthy plant with extreme weather preparation (drought)
